General.Name: Kingsmen Resources Ltd
General.Description: Kingsmen Resources Ltd., a junior mineral exploration company, engages in the acquisition and exploration of mineral properties in Canada and Mexico. It owns interests in the Las Coloradas Project, a silver-gold copper-lead-zinc project located in the Parral Mining District, State of Chihuahua, Mexico. The company was formerly known as Tumi Resources Limited and changed its name to Kingsmen Resources Ltd. in July 2015. Kingsmen Resources Ltd. was incorporated in 2000 and is based in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 1090 West Georgia Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6E 3V7
